mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (content, create_date, last_modified_date, images, comment_id, note_id, comment_author_id) VALUES (#{content}, NOW(), NOW(), #{images}, #{commentId}, #{noteId}, #{commentAuthorId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, content, create_date, comment_id, note_id, comment_author_id FROM comments WHERE note_id = #{noteId} ORDER BY create_date ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET content = #{content}, images = #{images}, comment_id = #{commentId}, last_modified_date = NOW(), note_id = #{noteId}, comment_author_id = #{commentAuthorId} WHERE id = #{id}
